enable_jquery.label: Enable jQuery and Other Plugins
enable_jquery.comment: This option initializes JS libraries in local scope which will not intersect with external jQuery. Currently included libraries: jQuery 1.11.3 , jQuery.ui 1.11.4, jQuery Color Animations 2.1.2, jQuery.easing 1.3 , jQuery.spy, jQuery Placeholder 2.0.7, noUislider 7.0.10, jQuery Form, jQuery.Magnific Popup 1.0.0. If you do not need to load this libraries in one file (for example this libraries are already loaded on your website), you can disable this option. Also we define jQuery as global object 'DRjQuery' so you will have to assign your jQuery to it. For more information see official manual

auto_approve.label: Auto Approve Reviews for Customer Group

show_honeypot.label: Enable Honeypot
show_honeypot.comment: Enable/disable a honeypot field that provides additional protection from bots (it is not visible for human visitors).

review_form_separate.label: Display review form on separate page

reviews_in_tab.label: Display reviews block in a tab

deny_change_polarity_group.label: Deny Administrator to change Popularity
deny_change_polarity_group.comment: Popularity is a attributes group in Product Entity. If allow change these attributes, they don't be update automatically

email_field.label: Email Field
email_field.comment: Enable/disable Email field on Review Form to Guest.

only_verified_buyer.label: Allow write review only for verified buyer

write_review_once.label: Allow Customer to Write 1 Review per Product

allow_guest_vote.label: Allow Guests to Vote for Review

css.label: CSS
css.comment: This area allows you to add your own style to Review. Please note embedding and presence of other styles on the page. Don't use this area to stylize the entire page.

active.label: Active
active.comment: Image must be in PNG or JPEG format, image uses 32 x 26 pixels size

unactive.label: Inactive
unactive.comment: Image must be in PNG or JPEG format, image uses 32 x 26 pixels size

allow_product_preview.label: Show Product Name and Image on Review Popup

allow_response.label: Response
allow_response.comment: Allow administrator posts comment for Review

qty_items_in_highest_contributors.label: Min Number of Posted Reviews to assign a "Highest Contributor" Status to Reviewer

public_key.label: Public Key
public_key.comment: Visit https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin#list to receive public key for your domain

private_key.label: Private Key
private_key.comment: Visit https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin#list to receive private key for your domain

recommended_product.label: Recommend this product to a friend

recommend_qty_available.label: Options for recommendations
recommend_qty_available.comment: Comma-separated values for dropdown 'Recommend this product'

bitly.label: Bitly (Bitly is a URL shortening service)

max_image_size.label: Max Image Size (MB)
max_image_size.comment: Image must be in PNG, GIF or JPEG format

images_max_count.label: Images Max Count
images_max_count.comment: 'Images Max Count' should be more than 0. To disable the 'Upload Your Image' Field, use the 'Enable/Disable Fields' tab.

copy_to.label: New Review Email Copy To
copy_to.comment: Comma-separated. If empty then email will be send to 'Customer Support'

email_notify_to_customer.label: Email Customer Notification
email_notify_to_customer.comment: This field depends on 'Settings applied to Customers -> Email Field' or it is necessary that the client has been logged in system.

blind_copy_to.label: Review Email Blind Copy To
blind_copy_to.comment: Comma-separated. If empty then email will be send to 'Customer Support'

qty_available.label: Reviews per Page
qty_available.comment: Comma-separated values for dropdown 'Show X per page'

qty_visible_items.label: Number of Visible Reviews in Slideshow

qty_items_in_reviewed_grid.label: Number of Items in Most Reviewed Products Grids

qty_items_in_liked_grid.label: Number of Items in Most Liked Products Grids

qty_items_in_disliked_grid.label: Number of Items in Most Disliked Products Grids

qty_items_in_customer_grid.label: Number of Items in Most Active Customers Grids

qty_items_in_most_helpful_grid.label: Number of Items in Most Helpful Review Grids

reindex_data_info.label: Reindex
reindex_data_info.comment: Updating data for 'Bestselling', 'Most Reviewed' and 'Highly Rated' types of sorting.

purchase_data.label: Purchase Data
purchase_data.comment:
If you have large "sales_flat_order" table. (Magento has many orders). Please enable Maintenance mode on your store and after that run this command.
Disable Maintenance mode after updates.

uninstall_plugin_info.label: Uninstall Extension
uninstall_plugin_info.comment: Be careful. This button will completely uninstall extension and delete all related information. Reviews will get back to original (standard) state.
